entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 3.
